urls.title: EXCLUSIVE Adviser to jailed HK tycoon Jimmy Lai says Apple Daily to shut within days
urls.description: Hong Kong pro-democracy newspaper Apple Daily will be forced to shut "in a matter of days" after authorities froze the company's assets under a new national security law, an adviser to jailed tycoon Jimmy Lai told Reuters on Monday.

urls.title: Apple Daily publisher, chief editor denied bail over alleged foreign collusionÔΩúAppledaily
urls.description: Hong Kong court denied bail to Next Digital CEO Cheung Kim-hung and Apple Daily editor-in-chief Ryan Law, who are charged with foreign collusion under the national security law, on Saturday. The case was adjourned until Aug. 13.
